Key Match Events: Che Adams scored a volley five minutes from time
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland’s winless run finally came to an end
Captain Andrew Robertson teed up chances but missed them
Liam Cooper had to be substituted with 12 minutes left due to injury
Lyndon Dykes is ruled out with an ankle injury
Lawrence Shankland was given a chance in attack
Post-Match Reflections: There was precious little to celebrate in the performance
Clarke may yet be tempted to throw the Bristol City forward a shot at glory
Clarke may be concerned about the lack of urgency and tempo in Scotland’s play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gibraltar last won a game in November 2022 against Andorra
Leeds defender Liam Cooper limped off with 12 minutes remaining
Ross McCrorie made his senior cap debut
James Scanlon, a 17-year-old forward with Manchester United, was on the opposing team
